segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this potential tragedy in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in drying that plate, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is flooding the floor, and she doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€” one wrong move and she'll slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy is on looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, hand in the jar, so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits below, innocent but part of the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will ruin the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is untouched and beautiful, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen if no one intervenes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful home could turn into a nightmare so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids don't realize the harm they could cause themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
